name: Dr. Ivo Robotnik's Trauma Pasta Genre Opera
name_original: Dr. Ivo Robotnik's Trauma Pasta Genre Opera
description:
Made by Daven Triplett, For Gaming Development Period 6

Welcome to Dr. Ivo Robotnik's facility, where he will ask you questions to figure out which genre best fits you. Be careful not to make him mad, this man has come close to taking over the world before!
